articles.title: Future-proofing business capabilities with AI technologies
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence has always promised speed, efficiency, and new ways of solving problems.  But what’s changed in the past few years is how quickly those promises are becoming reality.
articles.content: Artificial intelligence has always promised speed, efficiency, and new ways of solving problems. But what’s changed in the past few years is how quickly those promises are becoming reality. From oil and gas to retail, logistics to law, AI is no longer confined to pilot projects or speculative labs.
articles.author: MIT Technology Review Insights

articles.title: OpenAI has five years to turn $13 billion into $1 trillion
articles.summary: Some of America's most valuable companies are now leaning on OpenAI to fulfill major contracts, notes the FT.
articles.content: Some of America's most valuable companies are now leaning on OpenAI to fulfill major contracts, notes the FT.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for adult users
articles.summary: OpenAI says it will soon roll back some of ChatGPT's safeguards, and even allow the chatbot to engage in erotica for adult users.
articles.content: OpenAI says it will soon roll back some of ChatGPT's safeguards, and even allow the chatbot to engage in erotica for adult users.

articles.title: Mozilla’s Firefox adds Perplexity’s AI answer engine as a new search option
articles.summary: The integration offers conversational, cited answers instead of traditional links and follows positive feedback from earlier tests in select markets.  Perplexity will expand to mobile soon.
articles.content: The integration offers conversational, cited answers instead of traditional links and follows positive feedback from earlier tests in select markets. Perplexity will expand to mobile soon.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Google’s Gemini can now help you schedule Google Calendar meetings
articles.summary: Designed for one-on-one meetings, the tool lets you insert available time slots directly into an email, automatically creating a calendar invite once a recipient selects a time.
articles.content: Designed for one-on-one meetings, the tool lets you insert available time slots directly into an email, automatically creating a calendar invite once a recipient selects a time.

articles.title: Google Meet launches an AI-powered makeup feature
articles.summary: Google Meet finally has a makeup filter for those days when you don't feel like applying lipstick.
articles.content: Google Meet finally has a makeup filter for those days when you don't feel like applying lipstick.

articles.title: You’ll soon be able to shop Walmart from ChatGPT
articles.summary: Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to let shoppers buy products directly through ChatGPT.  The new integration will allow users to link their Walmart accounts, browse items, and instantly check out — a.
articles.content: Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to let shoppers buy products directly through ChatGPT. The new integration will allow users to link their Walmart accounts, browse items, and instantly check out — all within the chatbot.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: OpenAI and Broadcom partner on AI hardware

articles.content: OpenAI will purchase 10 gigawatts' worth of AI accelerator hardware from semiconductor Broadcom.

articles.content: Oracle and NVIDIA have expanded their partnership to make enterprise AI services more available, powerful, and practical. articles.title: Google updates Search and Discover with collapsible ads, AI features, and more
articles.summary: Google is rolling out updates to Search and Discover that introduce AI-powered features, improved navigation, and a new option to collapse ads.  While users can now hide sponsored results, the “Sponso.
articles.content: Google is rolling out updates to Search and Discover that introduce AI-powered features, improved navigation, and a new option to collapse ads. While users can now hide sponsored results, the “Sponsored” label will remain visible as they scroll — making ads persistent even when collapsed. Additional

articles.title: Sheryl Sandberg-backed Flint wants to use AI to autonomously build and update websites
articles.summary: Flint raised a $5 million seed round led by Accel, with participation from Sheryl Sandberg’s fund, Sandberg Bernthal Venture Partners, and prior investor Neo.

articles.title: Aquawise will show off its AI-driven water-quality tech at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
articles.summary: Aquawise uses satellite images and a physics-based AI model to monitor and predict water quality at aquaculture farms.
articles.content: Aquawise uses satellite images and a physics-based AI model to monitor and predict water quality at aquaculture farms.

articles.title: How Huawei is building agentic AI systems that make decisions independently
articles.summary: In a cement plant operated by Conch Group, an agentic AI system built on Huawei infrastructure now predicts the strength of clinker with over 90% accuracy and autonomously adjusts calcination paramete.
articles.content: In a cement plant operated by Conch Group, an agentic AI system built on Huawei infrastructure now predicts the strength of clinker with over 90% accuracy and autonomously adjusts calcination parameters to cut coal consumption by 1%—decisions that previously required human expertise accumulated over
